get.summary: Returns a list of properties that fit a criteria.
get.description: Get a list of property IDs within a specific geography that have a specific number of beds. Use orderby to choose how you want your results sorted.

parameters.name: geoid
parameters.description: A list of geographies that this property belongs to. These geoIDs are used by search engine and values should not be exposed to the public.

parameters.name: minBeds
parameters.description: The min Bed size to search from.

parameters.name: maxBeds
parameters.description: The max Bed size to search from.

get.summary: Returns property details based on an ID.
get.description: Get property details based on its attom ID.

get.summary: Returns properties within a zip code.
get.description: Get a list of properties within a zip code. Use propertytype and order by to narrow down your results.

parameters.name: postalcode
parameters.description: The zip code or postal code to search

parameters.name: propertytype
parameters.description: A specific property classification such as 'Detached Single Family'

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The current view index based on the pagesize and the total number of records available

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: The number of records to be returned with the request

get.summary: Returns properties and their characteristics that fit a criteria.
get.description: Get a list of property snapshots within a specific city that are within a desired size range and a specific property type.

parameters.name: cityname
parameters.description: The name of the city to search from

parameters.name: minLotSize1
parameters.description: The min Lot size 1 to search from

parameters.name: maxLotSize1
parameters.description: The max Lot size 1 to search from

parameters.name: propertytype
parameters.description: A specific property classification such as 'Detached Single Family'

get.summary: Returns basic property information and most recent transaction and taxes.
get.description: Get basic property information and most recent transaction and taxes for a specific address.

parameters.name: address1
parameters.description: The first line of the property address

parameters.name: address2
parameters.description: The second line of the property address

200.description: list of basic property information and most recent transaction and taxes

get.summary: Returns detailed property information and most recent transaction and taxes.
get.description: Get a detailed property information and most recent transaction and taxes for a specific address.

parameters.name: address1
parameters.description: The first line of the property address

parameters.name: address2
parameters.description: The second line of the property address

200.description: list of detailed property information and most recent transaction and taxes

get.summary: Returns basic property information and building permits detail.
get.description: Get a basic property information and building permits detail for a specific address.

parameters.name: address1
parameters.description: The first line of the property address

parameters.name: address2
parameters.description: The second line of the property address

200.description: Building permits record for a specific address
